Sentencas: Ni-YSZ is used as the anode of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) because it has excellent electrochemical performance for operation with coal-derived syngas.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: However, trace impurities, PH3 H2S AsH3, and Sb in coal-syngas can cause SOFC degradation.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: Described here is a means of removing PH3 impurity from syngas by using a Ni-based prefilter.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: In one test, a thin Ni-based filter was set upstream of a Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFC.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: The SOFC was exposed to syngas with PH3 under a constant current load at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: The filter decreased 20 ppm PH3 in the feed to a level which did not degrade the SOFC for over 400h until the filter became saturated.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: In another test, both H2S and PH3 were co-fed to the cell with Ni-based and Fe/Ni-based filters.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: The interaction between these two impurities did not significantly impact the filter performance with respect to PH3 removal for both filter formulations.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: The cell performance was evaluated by current-voltage measurements and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: Post-mortem analyses of the cell and filter were performed by means of XRD.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode
A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode

Sentencas: With proper filter design, the Ni-YSZ SOFC can operate on contaminated coal-syngas without degradation over a prescribed period of time.
Titulo: A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode
A prefilter for mitigating PH3 contamination of a Ni-YSZ anode
